body_html:
I think it is version representation bug of bazel. (0.10.0-) It should be removed hypen.

nvidia@tegra-ubuntu:~$ bazel version
..............................................
Build label: 0.10.0- (@non-git)
Build target: bazel-out/arm-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Mon Apr 26 21:36:52 +50060 (1517583937012)
Build timestamp: 1517583937012
Build timestamp as int: 1517583937012

I changed the version checking code of Tensorflow then compiled it successfully.

change this file,
"/home/nvidia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_nvidia/01c445c7b00bca0241913a79fcd99718/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 69, in closure_repositories

_check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.4.5")

to

_check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.10.0-")

body:
I think it is version representation bug of bazel. (0.10.0-) It should be removed hypen.
```
nvidia@tegra-ubuntu:~$ bazel version
..............................................
Build label: 0.10.0- (@non-git)
Build target: bazel-out/arm-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Mon Apr 26 21:36:52 +50060 (1517583937012)
Build timestamp: 1517583937012
Build timestamp as int: 1517583937012
```
I changed the version checking code of Tensorflow then compiled it successfully.

change this file,
`"/home/nvidia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_nvidia/01c445c7b00bca0241913a79fcd99718/external/io_bazel_rules_closure/closure/repositories.bzl", line 69, in closure_repositories`

```
_check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.4.5")
```
to
```
_check_bazel_version("Closure Rules", "0.10.0-")
```
